short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds a dialog with github stats to the package's npmjs page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a github starts count to the package's npmjs page. If you hover on the star-count or the star icon - a dialog opens with additional stats from github regarding this package.
